name: docassemble
description: Docassemble is a platform for building guided interviews and document assembly workflows. It helps create legal documents and forms using a python-based logic, web UI, and YAML-driven interview templates. Widely used in legal tech.

features.title: Guided Interviews
features.description: Create interactive questionnaires for document generation. User-friendly forms

features.title: Document Assembly
features.description: Automatically generate legal documents from templates. Streamlined paperwork

features.title: Python Logic
features.description: Powerful scripting for complex workflows. Flexible automation

features.title: Yaml Templates
features.description: Simple interview definition format. Easy to learn and maintain

features.title: Legal Tech Focus
features.description: Designed specifically for legal document workflows. Industry-standard tool

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep sensitive legal data on your server. Complete confidentiality and control
